t: Is Nashbar a Good Value Bike Brand? Quality and Components Reviewed

June 9, 2023 - It looks like they don't have their branded tires. I'm still using 26x1.5 Nashbar slicks for my commuter. ... I've had a set in my commuter for about 500 miles, they're doing great. ... Nashbar was my go-to for a bunch of Shimano small parts for years but those days are over. They has some seriously great deals on a pretty wide range of things, ahh, good times. ... Performance bought Nashbar back in 2000. Their model couldn't stand up to the overseas retailers, Amazon...
